    0)  https://qqdl.site/ -  Qobuz  (currently  redirects  to  TIDAL),  some  smartphones  might  run  out  of  memory  running  this,  a  new  site  by  Lucida  stuff,  previously  redirected  to  doubledouble.top   0)  https://deezmate.com -  Deezer  -  mp3  or  FLACs,  working  with  links   0)  https://free-mp3-download.net (Deezer,  FLAC,  separate  songs  downloading)  Here  you  can  find  (all?)  mp3/flac  files  from  Deezer.  If  the  site  doesn't  work  for  you,  use  VPN.  
If
 
the
 
site
 
doesn't
 
search,
 
mark
 
"use
 
our
 
VPN".
 
Single
 
files
 
download
 
and
 
captcha.
 
No
 
tags
 
for
 
track
 
numbers
 
and
 
file
 
names,
 
FLAC/MP3
 
16
 
bit
 
only.
  -  If  you  see  an  error  “file  not  found  on  this  server”  don't  refresh,  but  go  back  and  click  
download
 
again.
  -  From  time  to  time  it  happened  that  it  didn’t  show  up  the  FLAC  option,  and  that  it's  
“unavailable”,
 
and
 
sometimes
 
it
 
can
 
show
 
up
 
after
 
some
 
period
 
of
 
time.
 
The
 
site
 
started
 
to
 
have
 
some
 
problems,
 
but
 
it
 
was
 
fixed
 
already.
  -Open  every  found  track  in  a  new  tab,  as  back  button  won't  allow  you  to  see  search  results  
you
 
looked
 
for

will

  Later,  they  required  writing  to  the  bot  via  DM  to  access  the  welcome  channel  with  requests.

(Defunct)  2)  https://slavart.gamesdrive.net/tracks  (sometimes  used  to  work,  but  not  too  often)   As  of  June  2023-March  2024  it  is  defunct,  and  throws:  “There  was  an  error  processing  your  
request!”
